channel.title: How To Change D Claws Spec
channel.description:
Hey Guys Im Stuck My Servers D Claws Uses Up All The Spec At Once, How Can I Make It So It Only Uses Up 25%, Thanks,
-Italia Kid

item.title: How To Change D Claws Spec
item.dc:creator: @RS_Gamer001 RS Gamer001
item.description:
@RS_Gamer001 wrote:

[quote=“lmfaoown, post:3, topic:345307”][center]I think this is how you do it (This is off of a Delta based server

Look for this in your Client.java

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == CLAWID

Keep searching until you see something like this

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == CLAWID && specialAmount > 99){
specialAtk(true, 100, 252, 0x426);

The specialAtk(true, 100, 252, 0x426); wont be the exact line, it might be somewhat different.
Ok let me explain

specialAtk(true, 100, 252, 0x426);

true is if you do the declared or not.
100 is the amount of special needed and to be taken away.
252 is… No idea…
0x426 is the animation.

Ok, just look at your DClaw code, replace it to this (This is based on only taking off 25% of special
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && specialAmount > 24){
specialAtk(true, 25, 252, ANIMID);
getHit(#);
usingSpecial = true;
}
Change the # in getHit(#); to the hit you already have in the last DClaw code you had.

Then your done[/center][/quote]

I was gonna say that! (Not the same thing, but close… LOL)

Read full topic
item.source: How To Change D Claws Spec

item.title: How To Change D Claws Spec
item.dc:creator: @lmfaoown lmfaoown
item.description:
@lmfaoown wrote:

[center]I think this is how you do it (This is off of a Delta based server

Look for this in your Client.java

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == CLAWID

Keep searching until you see something like this

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == CLAWID && specialAmount > 99){
specialAtk(true, 100, 252, 0x426);

The specialAtk(true, 100, 252, 0x426); wont be the exact line, it might be somewhat different.
Ok let me explain

specialAtk(true, 100, 252, 0x426);

true is if you do the declared or not.
100 is the amount of special needed and to be taken away.
252 is… No idea…
0x426 is the animation.

Ok, just look at your DClaw code, replace it to this (This is based on only taking off 25% of special
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && specialAmount > 24){
specialAtk(true, 25, 252, ANIMID);
getHit(#);
usingSpecial = true;
}
Change the # in getHit(#); to the hit you already have in the last DClaw code you had.

Then your done[/center]

Read full topic

Try changing the GFX or the special attack type.
